archimate:Device.name: Administrative Tablets (ATABS)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Social Services, Nutrition, HR, Facilities Management, Quality Management, departmental meetings, workflow mobility.
Specifications:
• Processor Type: ARM-based mid-tier processor or Intel Core i3 • Memory Capacity: 8 GB RAM minimum • Storage Capacity: 128–256 GB SSD • Display Size and Resolution: 12 inches, Full HD (1920x1080), IPS touchscreen with anti-glare • Battery Life: Minimum 10 hours • Operating System: Windows 11 Pro (based on department software compatibility) • Connectivity Options: Wi-Fi 6 (ensure compliance with access points), Bluetooth 5.1, LTE • Weight and Dimensions: Lightweight, portable (< 2 lbs), approx. 11"x8"x0.5" • Input Options: Touchscreen, detachable keyboard/stylus for productivity • Camera Specifications: Front-facing camera 5 MP minimum for video conferencing, rear camera for document capture • Protective Equipment: Durable case, privacy screen protector, antimicrobial surfaces . Cases must have a stand. • Accessories: Keyboard and mouse
